alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 12:25AM CDT until July 21 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 1224 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Floris, or 10 miles northwest of Beaver, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Beaver, Forgan, Gate, Knowles, Elmwood, Boyd, Mocane, Slapout and Floris. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
